column4: my storage raid volume md0 has a .trash folder i cannot access help
it is taking up space
you might need to access it as root
star how do I set it so trash is just deleted
it does not make a .trash folder
how do I do that dark
ok ill check the prefs
no nautilus prefs
rune no system > preferences > nautilus preferences
no such file directory
ok i just accessed the folder
and went to edit prefs
there is ask before emptying trash
and include option to bypass trash (unmarked)
where do i look for that tab dark?
can't find nautilus prefs where you said it would be rune
7.10 does not have nautilus prefs
under system > prefs>
open nautilus then go to Edit > Preferences
do u mean open any file system window?
how do i "open nautilus"
open your home folder then go to Edit > Preferences
ok did that
I have done that
